content:
On March 17, Russian propagandists announced the beating of the Ukrainian Black Hawk Ukrainian helicopter. In the General Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, this information refutes.

About thisinformsGur MOU.

The military department stated that all BLACK HAWK boards of the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine are in excellent working condition, and their crews continue to perform combat and special tasks.

"Chernorotye propagandists and their slave owners from the Kremlin, who spread fakes about seemingly killing the helicopter of Ukraine's military intelligence, should be less abused with alcohol," Gur IU emphasized.

Earlier the Armyinformreportedwho has published the interception in which civilian Russians discuss the evacuation of the border areas of the Belgorod region and the continuation of mobilization measures.
title: In the swamps, they declared the beat of the Ukrainian helicopter Black Hawk: GUR answered
description: Gur IU informs about it. The military department stated that all the sides of Black Hawk ...
author: Army Inform
